ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] New UI
ygData.msgSnippet: I m DLing the patch right now. Says I have over 3 hours left. 21.6k connection can really suck sometimes. I hope it doesn t lag too badly. I wonder if my
ygData.messageBody:
I'm DLing the patch right now. Says I have over 3 hours left. 21.6k
connection can really suck sometimes.
I hope it doesn't lag too badly. I wonder if my darkelf wizard is kos in
jaggedpine.. I hope not.
I had to completely delete my virusscan software from my comp bc even when I
turned the stupid thing off it kept popping up to tell me that it detected a
virus on my mother's computer. Sheesh. Talk about annoying. And I would tell
it to shut up and a few min later it would do it again. I couldn't get it to
stop so I finally uninstalled it. It reinstalled itself and I had to flat
out delete the thing.
Anyone know of good virus software that isn't annoying like that?
luv,
-Su

> Well I successfully managed to get into EQ last night after what seemed
> like forever to download the patch.
> of course I waited till after I played for awhile before I DL the
jaggedpine
> zone.
>
> IMHO The new interface looks rather kewl. one feature I liked when you
> checked your skills it actually gives you the numerical values of your
skill
> level on every skill you have trained in and I mean EVERY skill not just
> the ones you are rated master or above at. Still trying to figure out the
> new icons for the spells atm. I like it that you can have separate chat
> windows for your frequently used chats guild tells etc. helps keep stuff
> separate a lot better when you are in a battle or have more than one
> conversation going at the same time one thing I miss from the old UI is
the
> face changing ability. hehe there are times when I would like to change my
> face around just for the heck of it but if I really wanna do that I guess
I
> could always go back to the old UI for that. Just wonder if I would have
to
> redo all my NewUI settings when I go back..
> As for JaggedPine I've not traveled there yet. I was at the Bazaar just
> before I logged and there were 238 peeps there when I went ld when my
> Antivirus autoscan kicked in at 5am EST this morning LOL. I was so
caught
> up in playing EQ I completely forgot to disable the task LOL
>
> Cynfyn MacCulloch 51 DESK
> Halyburton Bearhugger 28 BarbShm
> Saltaque 12 HIEEnch
> Qapmoc 11 HalfElf Ranger
> Oroblram 9 Hu War
> Doktari 6 HIE Cleric
> Defender of the Faith
